schools.name: New York Univ Med Coll

reviewDetails.comment: Very compassionate, efficient and thorough doctor
Dr Kalik is an excellent PCP.
Wonderful, caring, and thorough. Never rushes patients, always follows up.
very clear and complete. explained every aspect of my appointment. follow up was good and timely.

Dr. Kalik is kind, thorough, and knowledgeable. She listened to all of my concerns, asked relevant follow up questions and responded appropriately by ordering the necessary follow-up procedures. Highly recommend.
Dr. Kalik is very attentive, caring, responsive and knowledgeable
Dr Kalik is very personable and easy to talk to. Most Importantly, she is very thorough and takes the time to talk through each detail.
Dr. Kalik continues to be a rock star.  Been with her for over 25  years.  She's timely, attentive, incredibly thorough and has an amazing network of referrals.  Highly recommend to everyone.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Jamil listened to me and was thorough with her her follow up and diagnosis.
KInd, good listener, didn't rush me.  Highly recommend!
Dr. Jamil is very nice, takes her time with the patient and explains everything very well. Love having her as my general physician.
Dr. Jamil is understanding, knowledgeable and easy going. Enjoy having as my PCP.
Dr. Jamil is so kind and warm. She is easy to talk to and asks great questions. Very knowledgeable as well! I highly recommend her!
Dr. Jamil was very friendly and helpful and prescribed some medications and  recommended other remedies to ease my symptoms.
She is thorough and very knowledgeable. Friendly and makes patients feel at ease

I would not go back to Dr. Jamil. My annual wellness checkup was incomplete, she didnt check a couple of items, rushed through it and wasn't really caring.  I never received a call from her about my lab results, only a text through the Weill Cornell portal. She claimed everything was fine, despite highlighted areas by the lab and did not come back to my questions and concerns. I asked her for clarification or a phone call without any response. .

residency.locationName: New York University College Of Medicine

reviewDetails.comment: been going to Dr. Fenyves for the last 10 years and he is excellent -- never feel rushed, easy to talk to, great follow-up after visits, and most importantly very thorough during visits, leaves no stone unturned during my annual physicals -- highly recommend
Dr Fenyves is very friendly and approachable. He answers questions with a lot of common sense and gives you the right amount of information to make decisions about follow up treatment etc.

Dr. Fenyves is exceptional. Spends a lot of time with each patient listening carefully and explaining everything. He looks for alternatives and explains trade-offs before prescribing medication. My wife and I both travel 30-40 minutes to stay with Dr. Fenyves.
He is on time to his appointments. Courteous and professional. Pushes healthy diet and exercise to stay fit.

Yes, he is a very thorough doctor, discusses pros/cons of medications, has a circumspect approach to treatments, maintains a very detailed medical history, very considerate of the last visit and if any changes have occurred, has a very personable style of speaking with me about any concerns I may have.

Dr Fenyves is an experienced Dr who treated me like an individual, rather than a number. He is diligent and thorough. He took the time to discuss my symptoms and listen to my concerns. He asked the right questions and followed up with me (after my visit) via email. Thank you Dr Fenyves.

I would absolutely recommend Dr. Fenyves.  As my primary care physician, he has always provided/shared the results of routine tests from physicals VERY quickly.  In reviewing my records, he advises/recommends when I should have other tests or immunizations done.  Each and every time I have reached out to Dr. Fenyves about any medical issues, he has been very responsive.  He will either schedule an in-person appointment or a video appointment right away.  He also follows up on whatever the issue to check on my well being or if further steps need to be taken.   I can not say enough wonderful things about him.

reviewDetails.comment: I have been a patient or Dr Rosenberg's for many years.  She is thorough, is kind and knowledgeable.  I have previously recommended her to family and will continue to do so.

I arrived at the office, my visit to the doctor was at 10:00 am and they told me that there was no doctor, another doctor was replacing him.  I asked why no one called me and told me about it. I canceled my appointment.
I have been seeing Dr. Rosenberg for over 25 years.  That should say it all.  I trust her completely and feel very confident in her intelligence, attention to detail and compassion.
Dr Rosenberg is a gem! I feel so lucky to have her as my doctor!
The best!!!!

reviewDetails.comment: Extremely kind and friendly, answered all our questions, spent the full amount of time with us necessary to put us at ease as new parents.

Dr Guidera is great! She takes care of both our children, she's focused, knowledgeable, and proactive about sending patients to specialists in case we need. And my toddler just loves her. We very much recommend Manhattan Queens Pediatrics.

Dr. Guidera is kind and patient with our son. He is growing more and more aware and doesn’t always like going in for appointments. Dr. Guidera is mindful of this and works quickly, to ensure our sons comfort. She provides great advice.
Great doctor who knows how to talk to parents. She is good with kids and knows her stuff. The office is very professional.
She is kind, takes her time and ensures that she is speaking to the child and not just the parent.
Dr. Guidera is very attentive and great to childrean.
Great experience!!
Great with children who are scared and very warm and gracious.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Igel is caring and thorough.  He takes the time to get to know his patients before he recommends treatment

His office is non responsive to phone calls and will not even return a phone call. A 30 minute video consult cost $600+.A follow up video would have cost the same but I canceled the appointment due to his office not returning my call.
Best doctor I’ve ever had. Easy to talk to and makes me feel like I have options
Dr. Igel was thorough in exam and explained conditions in a simple and easy for me to understand. I appreciate his attentiveness.
Dr. Igel is the best endocrinologist I've had.  He listens to your concerns, answers your questions and tailors the treatment plan to your needs.

Dr. Igel is very honest and I really needed a doctor who was going to be up front with me. He found a plan of action for me and had all the answers to my questions.  He also gave options which was greatly appreciated.
Dr Igel is extremely thorough, empathic and personable.

reviewDetails.comment: Fantastic person, office is organized and he is very pleasant to discuss.
Dr Young appears to be thorough in his examinations, seeks to explain his findings in simple practical terms and is always cordial during the visits.
I love Dr. Josh Young. He does a thorough exam, speaks respectfully to the patient, and the office is well run and organized. I feel very comfortable going there for my eye care.
Solid and personable optometrist. Knowledgeable. Also a nice office.

reviewDetails.comment: She is knowledgeable, thorough, and caring.  Her office is patient-friendly.  I am very happy with her
Dr. Guderian is an exceptionally considerate and patient physician. She gave me an accurate, reassuring diagnosis, and responded quickly to an early morning request.

She's has a great bedside manner and takes the time to ask good questions.  She listens to you and tries to find solutions to any health issues you might have.  I've never had a doctor who spent sufficient time at an appointment and so glad I found Dr. Guderian through a friend.
Great doctor.
